Text: The reason this is only half the size of the m4a/alac source on archive.org is, that the flac is only 16 bits per sample and not 32 as the m4a on archive.org.

I created a torrent from the original m4a files with 32 bit per sample FLAC.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7544348

Many improvements that this torrent makes (file naming, tags) are also included in that other torrent.
